item.title: Build Smart Actions
item.description: What are Smart Actions? Smart Actions are reusable JavaScript modules designed to perform discrete tasks within the Smart Environment. They serve as behavioral primitives that can be combined into sequences using Smart Collections or Action Groups, enabling complex operations through simple, modular components.

item.title: Settings in Smart Connections
item.description: Documentation how to configure settings in the Obsidian Smart Connections plugin. DO may be index that links to settings sections in component-specific pages .

item.title: Community Lean Coffee

item.title: Smart Connect Update: Let's Dive into Community Actions and Custom GPTs
item.description: Hey there, it‚Äôs Brian. Today, I want to walk you through a feature update I just shipped in Smart Connect, something I‚Äôm pretty excited to share‚ÄîCommunity Actions.

item.title: Commands
item.description: Commands in the Obsidian Smart Connections plugin are accessed using the Obsidian Command palette. Random Note opens a random note from the connections to the current note Refresh & Make Connections recreates the embedding for the current note and refreshes the Connections pane (Smart Connections view) Open: Connections pane (Smart Connections view; ‚ÄúFind Connections‚Äù) Smart Lookup (semantic search) pane ChatGPT pane Smart Chat .

item.title: Connections pane
item.description: why Linking relevant notes is a best practice in most personal knowledge management (PKM) systems. Unfortunately, this is a time consuming process and linking to all relevant content has many undesired side effects.

item.title: Stability vs Innovation in the Smart Ecosystem
item.description: I wanted to take a moment to address a topic that‚Äôs been on my mind lately: the balance between stability and innovation within our Smart Ecosystem. As many of you know, our primary mission is to empower individuals with AI through open-source software.
